overview: Daniel falls in love with his best friend Beto and kisses him. Beto gets depressed and goes to vent to Diego that he urgently wants to have sex with any girl that appears in front of him. Meanwhile, Tio Armando is getting drunk at the bar and runs over a guy. After this accident, the lives of these friends go back in time several times without explanation.
title: Bom dia, Rio de Janeiro
